puppeteer:Reinforcements.NAME: Reinforcements
puppeteer:Reinforcements.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand.

puppeteer:Vanguard.NAME: Vanguard
puppeteer:Vanguard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The puppeteer:Doll closest to the enemy gains !M! puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:Spearhead.NAME: Spearhead
puppeteer:Spearhead.DESCRIPTION: The target puppeteer:Doll charges through the closest enemy, dealing damage equal to double its puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:DollActivation.NAME: Doll Activation
puppeteer:DollActivation.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand. NL Exhaust.
puppeteer:DollActivation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Hourai into your hand. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:MaterialCollection.NAME: Material Collection
puppeteer:MaterialCollection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Hourai into your hand.

puppeteer:LuminousDolls.NAME: Luminous Dolls
puppeteer:LuminousDolls.DESCRIPTION: ALL puppeteer:Dolls lose !M! puppeteer:Charge. NL ALL enemies lose Strength this turn equal to the puppeteer:Charge lost.

puppeteer:Deanimate.NAME: Deanimate
puppeteer:Deanimate.DESCRIPTION: puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL Gain Block equal to its puppeteer:Charge.
puppeteer:Deanimate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL Gain Block equal to its puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:ToTheLimit.NAME: ToTheLimit
puppeteer:ToTheLimit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M! Dexterity. NL Gain [E] [E].

puppeteer:Transference.NAME: Transference
puppeteer:Transference.DESCRIPTION: puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL ALL puppeteer:Dolls gain puppeteer:Charge equal to its puppeteer:Charge. NL Exhaust.
puppeteer:Transference.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: puppeteer:Destroy a puppeteer:Doll. NL ALL puppeteer:Dolls gain puppeteer:Charge equal to its puppeteer:Charge.

puppeteer:SummonShanghai.NAME: Summon Shanghai
puppeteer:SummonShanghai.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Summon a puppeteer:Shanghai_Doll. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:SummonHourai.NAME: Summon Hourai
puppeteer:SummonHourai.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Summon a puppeteer:Hourai_Doll. NL Exhaust.

puppeteer:Perception.NAME: Perception
puppeteer:Perception.DESCRIPTION: If the closest enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.
